actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to terminate production controls on peanuts, to terminate price support operations in effect for such commodity, and to remove customs duties and import quotas on such commodity.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938 to terminate, effective with the 1979 crop, all acreage allotments, poundage quotas, marketing quotas, and price support operations for peanuts.

titles.title: A bill to terminate production controls on peanuts, to terminate price support operations in effect for such commodity, and to remove customs duties and import quotas on such commodity.
